-- in --
package test

templ script(c templ.Component) {
	@c() {
		<script>
			var a = {{ data }}
			var b = "{{ data }}"
			var c = '{{ data }}'
			var d = `{{ data }}`
		</script>
	}
}

-- out --
package test

templ script(c templ.Component) {
	@c() {
		<script>
			var a = {{ data }}
			var b = "{{ data }}"
			var c = '{{ data }}'
			var d = `{{ data }}`
		</script>
	}
}
